website_summaries.verdict: Engineered to provide a well-balanced indoor listening experience.
pros: Offers eight hours of battery life
Capable of sustaining high-volume performance throughout the duration, yet uniquely programmed to create a balanced listening experience that doesn't overpower in one area or another
We love the modern design that can add to one's own interior aesthetics
cons: Can be described as large, but not bigger than a basketball

customer_reviews.title: Incredible Sound for an Incredible Price
customer_reviews.text: I don't review products often, but when I do it means that the product is awesome ... or terrible. I have tested and tested and tested wireless speakers -- this is by and far the best. This sounds better than Google's Home Max and Sonos and is half the price or more. Voice & Calling: Amazing, honestly, I keep this at my desk and take all my calls on it all.day.long. Music: Through the roof, I don't know how they did it - but it sounds amazing. Don't waste your money on other speakers that are twice the price or more. I've always been a fan of Harmon/Kardon and they absolutely deliver here.
customer_reviews.author: Reid

customer_reviews.title: Best wireless out there by far!
customer_reviews.text: I bought two and they work really well. I mean REALLY well. These speakers are by far the best product and value or anything on the market right now. Glad I waited 2 years to buy and got the 4's since they connect to each other seamlessly. I usually have them 15-25ft apart and my phone is often 30-50 ft away. I'm sure when summer comes around I'll try to extend those in the backyard. Great bass and you can turn it up loud....very loud without distortion. I shopped around a lot so save yourself the time and energy and just by these. Hope this helps you decide.
customer_reviews.author: TRGau

customer_reviews.title: YES!
customer_reviews.text: Love them so far 5 days in. Bass is adequate once both (I bought two) speakers sync up in stereo which can take 5-10 sec. LOUD for their size. I found however the highs get a little harsh when turned up past 66% and the bass doesn't keep up volume wise. So far I found the sweet spot for bass/treble balance between 40-60% vol depending on location and content. So far, great value!
customer_reviews.author: rp2000

customer_reviews.title: Genuine onyx studio 4!
customer_reviews.text: This is the real deal! A genuine onyx studio 4 by Harman Kardon at an excellent price! Not sure why anyone would pay more anywhere else. Beautiful well balanced sound!
customer_reviews.author: Maegan

customer_reviews.title: Only the true music lovers will understand.
customer_reviews.text: Harmon Kardon Onyx Studio 4: This is one awesome product & a must have for the true music lovers. I was at a friends party when I saw this. Honestly, I’ve owned many branded products which have very low & inferior bass but this one is just perfect. Love the bass effects & the voice clarity. A genuine fan of such superior high quality products. I’m so happy to own this.
customer_reviews.author: technofreak

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is excellent. I was going to place this in my ...
customer_reviews.text: As others have said, the speaker is larger than you would expect. The sound quality is excellent. I was going to place this in my home office but, after hearing it, I put in to my bedroom. I enjoy listening to music every night on the HK. The blue one is my choice and I'm glad I did.
customer_reviews.author: Tulane Coleman

customer_reviews.title: Powerful bass great for techno/dance, but not for classical, acoustic, or voice
customer_reviews.text: Great for for dance parties. But its bass can muddy detail in classical or acoustic music. Not impressing either for listening to speaking voices either. So, if you want to buy this for bass-busting oomph, go for it. If you want clarity of detail (esp in midrange) you might want to look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Franco S. Cirulli

customer_reviews.title: Unparalleled sound for the size
customer_reviews.text: Bought the Onyx Studio 4 to replace the original Onyx Studio because I love the sound so much. Sound quality is pretty much the same (which is amazing!) , but this one has a better battery life and an auxiliary input not previously available. I have this connected to my Amazon Echo Dot via aux input as this connection will always be better than bluetooth. The sound is simply incredible and I listen to so much more music now that I have it connected to my Echo. My previous Onyx lasted about 2 years and I bought the square trade 4 year warranty. Hopefully I won't have to use it.
customer_reviews.author: VDo

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, great bluetooth connection, but POOR experience via AUX/3.5mm cable. It has not problem playing audio via bluetooth connection and the sound is great for me. BUT, when you connect it via an AUX or 3.5mm cable, the sound cuts out and in unless you play at max volume. I've tried my laptop, my iPhone, 3 aux cables of 2 brands, same issue. I bought a JBL Pulse 3, same issue. I guess all Harman speakers have the same problem. Customer service from Harman is really "funny", they can't fix the problem and they say it is a "bluetooth speaker" so you shouldn't expect it to work without Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker by itself. Skipping and static when multiple speakers linked together.
customer_reviews.text: The speaker itself gets 5 stars! Great sound quality, better than BOSE in my opinion. On the other hand, if you are interested in trying to link 2 or more together, don't waste your money. I recently purchased my second speaker with the hopes of syncing them together to potentially have one inside and one outside, or one on each side of my bed. There was too much static and skipping in the music, even with my phone right in the center of the two. I have decided to return my second speaker since without being able to sync them together their is no need for it.
customer_reviews.author: Samuel

customer_reviews.title: The sound quality is very bad.  More like knock-off Product
customer_reviews.text: You should not purchase this item. Sound quality is very poor compared Harman Kardon Onyx 2 and Onyx 3. I sent it back immediately. Sounds more like an AM station. I definitely do not recommend this item. Its about 50% sound quality of its predecessors. Not sure if the corporation cut back on quality in exchange for more profits, but please save your $$ on this. This is my 1st negative review ever. Very bad item
customer_reviews.author: John I.

customer_reviews.title: This speaker give great sound my 4 star is only due to battery ...
customer_reviews.text: This speaker give great sound my 4 star is only due to battery life it's not that long under 2hrs at full volume
customer_reviews.author: christopher cook

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t sound like my studio 3 at all
customer_reviews.text: I previously owned a studio 3 and it was amazing but unfortunately it was stolen. I did a little research and figured the 4 was the newer version and had to be better. It wasn’t. Not sure if this speaker was a dud or just busted but it didn’t have nearly the sound quality my last one did. It actually sounded like it was blown. Also not sure why these are so much cheaper. My last one was 250 and this one is almost half the price. I guess the old saying is true you pay for what you get. I returned because I was very disappointed. Hope this helps.
customer_reviews.author: Case E McCrodden

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Battery Maybe?
customer_reviews.text: Not really sure what the problem is. Granted, most of the time we use this speaker it has been plugged in. But, as of late we have been using it more with it being unplugged. If we turn up the volume much at all the speaker will "crackle" and then turn off. Happens pretty frequently and we have hunt for an extension chord to plug in. Really like the sound plugged in but without ac power, it is not feasible as a speaker. Definitely not for portability at least. Maybe I got a lemon? Dunno. Was hoping for some support but no one to reach out too.
customer_reviews.author: Amy G.

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound with Notable Bass
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound, and decent bass for such a compact speaker. Very easy to connect via Bluetooth with Amazon Echo. I do wish that the Echo would play simultaneously, and do not understand why it has to be one or the other. I wanted to play music in two adjoining rooms.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce D

customer_reviews.title: Love the Harmon Kardon Onyx speakers!!
customer_reviews.text: I had a Harmon Kardon Onyx 2 and it was awesome! It never worked quite right. The built in charger didn’t work so it always had to be plugged in. Bass speaker blew so I bought the Harmon Kardon 4 and I’m very happy!! Nothing compares to these speakers. The Onyx 4 has the same great sound but the 8hr battery life is awesome!! I’m going to get a 2nd one and pair it for true stereo sound.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The speaker sounds excellent but keeps breaking up when connecting to another one.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Eggleston

customer_reviews.title: Used to be amazing
customer_reviews.text: Used to be a fantastic speaker until the battery stopped working. Not sure what happened but it won’t even charge anymore. I loved the speaker but it died on me after only 4 months. Had plenty of volume with great sounding bass. Plenty loud for hanging with a big group of friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Banks

customer_reviews.title: Speaker is great - very good status of used was BS -
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 used - in “very good” amazon certified on good speaker but no certification on second. one was fantastic one was thrown in box- no cords no packaging inside original box and dirty all over front of speaker. It works. I used a cord from my second one- debating returning or buy cord and call it good since they don’t have them at same price and it way more. Disappointed. Not HK fault. This is on amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: More impressive than expected
customer_reviews.text: Great, booming sound from a relatively small speaker. More than ample sound to fill up my large living room. Seamlessly syncs with my blue tooth devices (iPad, iPhone). I choose not to use the auxiliary cord to hook it up to my television, since there is no remote to control the volume in that mode, or to mute it, if your phone rings and you want to mute the TV. The only way to control the volume and/or mute, with the auxiliary cord in use, is to get up, go over to the speaker, and manually press the volume button. Provided you're in blue tooth mode, however, it's just fantastic.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great potential
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome speaker. The volume is super loud. I bought this in March 2020 and my speaker will not charge. After about 4 months my speaker will not charge. I've bought another cord and it still doesn't work. So I'm frustrated because this is an expensive purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Dena

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound of this speaker. On some of my music library, I sometimes wish it was just a little louder, but I think that is an issue with my phone and not the device (my phone plays music only to a certain level on most headphones and speakers). The battery has not gone out on me in the middle of listening, and I have used it for five or six hours at a time. It has had no problems connecting with bluetooth (which is impressive, because again my phone does not do the best connecting to other devices). Overall, VERY happy with the product and have had no problems with it yet.
customer_reviews.author: DB

customer_reviews.title: big
customer_reviews.text: This is bigger than I expected, which is clearly one reason the sound quality is so good. For a little box, this thing can sing. It has a full sound that you never hear from a bluetooth or headphone. It's may not match my home theater, but this thing makes life at work so much better. I have only had it a few days, but I would (and might) buy it again. There is a newer model, but the specs are about the same. I bought this for music, but the phone connectivity makes a huge bonus. I love the speaker phone functionality.
customer_reviews.author: andrew

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't pair well with other speakers
customer_reviews.text: The sound is good especially for the price but if you want to pair it with other speakers it's problem. I bought 2 of them to use in different parts of the apartment. The sound on both speaker when pairing them it not good—lots of static and intermittent disconnect. I tried it in different areas of my apartment with no success. Even when the 2 speakers are relatively close the connect is still not good. I returned one of them. Also the battery life is lousy certainly not 8 hours maybe 3 at the most.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Cimini

customer_reviews.title: Renders other BT speakers nearly useless.
customer_reviews.text: Beyond the fact that the speaker itself blends into the background like some sort of objet d'art, I have been more than pleased by the quality and performance of this speaker. Great bass (handles my Raja Kumari, Megan Thee Stallion, and Pimp C sessions like a champ), clear high-quality sound, totes around the house easily, and the battery life is exactly what I expected form it. I have even set it inside of my back porch while I'm in the yard and it sounds just as good outside as it does inside. I really look forward to buying another to connect for stereo mode, and a few to hide around the house for fun.
customer_reviews.author: Eric D

customer_reviews.title: Dynamic and full sound
customer_reviews.text: I was thinking this speaker would be smaller but it’s size is fine. The directions were not great for setting up the app, so I have to figure that out yet. This speaker sounds great though! The sound is full and dimensional. Music sounds like it’s filling the room and you can hear the intricacies of th music. This is great for most music, with the exception of bass heavy music, only because Of my preference to have lower bass (in r&b style music). I’d love to have equalizer capabilities for this speaker, but maybe I can learn a way to control the levels. I was apprehensive about the blue color but I actually really like it. Overall, amazing speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: Below average for cost.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this item to have a Bluetooth speaker for my bedroom. After using this speaker a week I have come to the conclusion that this is fair in sound quality. There is a slight static sound when sound turned up to max. In regards to battery life this is by far below average. This does not hold a battery the entire 8 hours based on the level you are playing music or audios. Returning this item and invested a little more and went with a more reliable brand that’s known for quality and battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Mama-to-a-Gem

customer_reviews.title: Started Out Great. Poor Product Life.
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a Father's Day gift in June 2018 and it was a nice step up from my Bose Soudlink. We've used the Onyx occasionally in the kitchen or out on the deck, and never dropped or abused it. Last week it stopped holding the bluetooth connection more than a few minutes and the battery now lasts about 15 minutes when we used to be able to play it for 2+ hours. We got almost two years out of it, but it should last longer than that for the price. Based on the poor reviews calling Harmon Kardon support will do nothing. And it's made in China. Won't buy another HK product.
customer_reviews.author: D. Schultz

customer_reviews.title: Not durable and unresponsive Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: Battery life reduced dramatically after about 4 months after I purchased it. We needed to connect it to use it. Kind of defeats the purpose of being battery operated. Now, roughly 7 months in, it completely stopped working. I wrote a request to customer service. Twice. Nothing. Not even an acknoledgement they received it. It sounds cool though. Bottom line, not worth for the price. If it was 30 bucks or less, it'd be a good purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Garnisé

customer_reviews.title: Latest version, brand new, will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Great brand new latest version, I love it, this is my third one. Replacing old cumbersome systems
customer_reviews.author: NewGuy 2012

customer_reviews.title: You Can Has 808!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been so frustrated with the quality of portable bluetooth speakers. Nothing is worse that the Beastie Boys saying "nothing sounds quite like an 8 - 0 - 8" and there's no 808 accompaniment lol... Well all the booms show up! Also it's crystal clear when you're listening to the classical guitar stylings of Andreas Segovia. It's like a live performance with every string scratch audible. I highly recommend this speaker. Satisfying in every genre from opera to rock to Detroit Techno. buy and enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Pacificos

customer_reviews.title: Purchase the warranty...
customer_reviews.text: First off it’s an amazing speaker. I’ve had many different kinds of Bluetooth speakers and this was my favorite by far. The reason for 3 stars is the battery life. Make sure to get the warranty. Just purchased the speaker like 4 months ago and my battery dies after 2-3 hrs of playtime at the max. Really good for convoys for when I have a six hr drive up north for Army training just need to leave it plugged in. Durable to. Has fallen twice and still works amazingly. Again only downfall is the battery after charge unplug it before use.
customer_reviews.author: frida

customer_reviews.title: She loves it......
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife as a Mother's day gift. She loves it and the sound is fantastic. Haven't used it much off the AC plug so I can't make any strong comments on battery life. There are NO instructions on how to connect it to the apple iPhone. I just fumbled around and all of a sudden it was working. I have no idea how I did it (don't ask me to try to repeat my steps). I am tech savvy but Com'on guys give me a hint where to start. VERY poor instructions. That's why only two stars for Bluetooth connectivity.
customer_reviews.author: Ontario view

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: It’s a great speaker sounds great and $500 is msrp at most retailers but I picked this up for $125 worth the money when you get such good of sound out of one small speaker. I wish it was waterproof of resistant in some way being an expensive speaker. I don’t spend a lot of money on mobile stuff once I heard this I figured I should upgrade my Sony iPod dock that doesn’t even have the lightning port to plug in your phone let alone Bluetooth like this has. And connecting multiple phones is cool too if someone else wants to play something just connect and play then go back to yours easy.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Porter

customer_reviews.title: poor bluetooth quality | speaker is too large
customer_reviews.text: Bluetooth cuts out and there is an audible hiss on low volume. I am going with a smaller bluetooth speaker hooked directly up to the source. While bluetooth is an amazing technology, it still has some bugs to be worked out. HK should develop a smaller speaker as this one is obtrusive and ugly. Many of the newer, less known speaker manufacturers put out speakers that blend into the office environment.
customer_reviews.author: techwriter

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: This came highly recommended and the sound quality is good, but it's almost useless as a portable device. After owning for a couple of months the battery dies within minutes of being disconnected from power. I've had the JBL Flip 3/4 and honestly, the sound isn't that much better than those devices, and on the JBL's the battery lasts for hours and hours. In addition, we've had problems with the power adapter as well; it seems to work only sporadically, further reducing the usefulness of the speaker. Very disappointing, will probably buy the bigger JBL portable device.
customer_reviews.author: NN

customer_reviews.title: Great sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, great price, portability. What more can you ask than that? HK has done it again, and with a cheaper price tag when I purchased it through Amazon. Seriously, how does Amazon even profit off of the great price? I had doubts to the quality of the next generation of the Onyx because HK had been bought by Samsung. However, if anything the quality exceeds that of previous generations before HK was bought by Samsung. Great product, would purchase again and expand the sound range within my house!
customer_reviews.author: Josh Lee

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware!!!!
customer_reviews.text: They send me a product that once the volume was up to a certain point the speaker would make a crackling sound. The speaker was pretty much new so I didn’t understand. I don’t think they check their products to see if they work before they ship them out. Disappointing experience. This is most important part, I had to pay the shipping to send their defective product. Smh. $8 it cost me to send it back. I’m still bitter.
customer_reviews.author: JMK

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but why did they cheap out?
customer_reviews.text: The sound is amazing. The deep base is great and the midtones aren't reduced and it can can get loud. The speaker performs best when it's plugged in and I have no problem with portability due to it's size and weight. The touchpad controls are were I have a issue. The power button and Bluetooth are lighted but they seem to have scrimped on cost for the volume controls that aren't lighted and hard to find plus they aren't very responsive. If the volume controls were lighted and more responsive it would have gotten a 5
customer_reviews.author: deadeye

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working within a year
customer_reviews.text: It has been almost a year since I purchased it. Barely used it, today it just stopped working! Blue tooth looked fine and all the lights are on, there’s just no sound, I tried my phone and my computer, no sound. I came here to look at others who have the same Issue. This is unbelievable disappointed for the brand That’s named too and their products just stop working within one year....and I did some research try to fix this, there are many people has the same issue...
customer_reviews.author: moon

customer_reviews.title: This is a great sounding unit. Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I really like the sound that comes out of this unit. This item delivers a clean and rich sound which is beyond expectations. The unit is light and very portable. If you are looking for a unit within the category of portable or a stand a lone unit for a small space, you will not go wrong by purchasing this one. Great design and not bad on the eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have a studio 3 in the garage and when my gf said she wanted a BT speaker in the bedroom to replace her broken one I decided to get one of these. I tried linking the Studio 3 and the Studio 4 and could not figure it out after about half an hour of trying, kinda sucks as it would have been cool for parties, I didnt buy it for that feature but they advertise both speakers as being compatible with the connecting feature, just not the same thing i guess. I was able to get both to play using my samsung phone's dual play feature.
customer_reviews.author: Eric B.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Speaker WILL NOT BE DISAPPOINTED. I have always been into music and appreciated great sounding speakers and these deliver. Thinking off buying second one just to pair up, but the sound you get from one is moreeeeee than enough. *** Update 12-19-19 / Speaker still sounds great but not holding charge like it used to. Listening at 1/3 volume maybe getting 4.5 to 5hrs before red blinking battery light comes on.. Poss battery issue and wearing down. Would love vender to reach out to me for solution, Thanks ***Rating now 4 stars
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: The sound is amazing for under $100
customer_reviews.text: For a speaker that's under $100 the sound quality is amazing. Mind you, this is a large speaker but it delivers incredible sound. I also love the handle for easy transport. I have not yet used up the battery so I cannot speak on battery life, but will update this review when I can. I listen to both pop and classical music on this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon SuperReviewr

customer_reviews.title: Best Bluetooth Speaker...period!
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd HK Onyx Speaker I have purchased for myself and other family members and it still blows me away every time. The sound quality, bass response and volume are simply amazing to me and rivals my Sonos 5 which is a much more expensive speaker. The new version has an Aux input and phone control which are nice additions to an already great product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Caton

customer_reviews.title: A Phenomenal speaker and the loudest onyx yet!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 5th Onyx studio wireless speaker, the new onyx•4 is louder than my onyx•2 and just one onyx•4 speaker is louder than my pair of onyx•3’s together! I only felt the need to purchase a second onyx•4 because i’m all about perfect symmetry!
customer_reviews.author: sÿsterwick

customer_reviews.title: Bass lovers only
customer_reviews.text: Im leaving a review because reading other reviews before i buy products is what helps me to make the best decision. If you love bass like i do, you cant go wrong. The sound is great and fills large spaces indoors and outdoors. The only con is you need to keep it plugged up for longer duration of playing time. If you have a cook out just use an extension and ur problem is solved. Best bang (literally) for my bucks. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great, battery life non existent
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was great for almost the whole first year. Sound quality is amazing, battery lasted throughout the day and it’s not to big. But the battery stopped holding a charge I guess. Will no longer run without being plugged in, so I do not get to use it much as I build houses by trade. So there is not a lot of power out there In the early stages. Looked at upgrading to a newer one, but not so sure now.
customer_reviews.author: Chris vincenzo

customer_reviews.title: they love it but they have the gen 2
customer_reviews.text: so a lot of friends of mine use it for work, they love it but they have the gen 2. so i got the gen 4 thinking it was the same and the sound isnt even as half as loud as there gen 2 if i could i would send it back but it has been to long since it was a gift and didn't use it right away. get the gen 2 if u can. think this once is not as loud because u can link a lot together and that's what the company is shooting for.
customer_reviews.author: teasha

customer_reviews.title: Poor product
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because we were at a friend's house and heard this speaker and it sounded great. So I bought it and we used it all the time and now all of a sudden it has quit working. For the money these cost they should last longer than 11 months. Very disappointed with this speaker and I wouldn't recommend buying one. This is just ridiculous as to how short of life this speaker has. I truly believe that yall should replace this item since I paid as much as I did for it. I will let everyone know not to buy this product.
customer_reviews.author: wayne w.

customer_reviews.title: This is a great little speaker with a good sound and bass quality
customer_reviews.text: This is little speaker is great for entertaining a small crowd in a family/recreational size room. The speaker is small enough to be transportable and loud enough for everyone to perform their greatest dance steps. The battery life is a little suspect when the speaker is play at max volume, but if you have the speaker plugged into an outlet there is no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Big Mike

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. Sounds amazing for a little guy. Sounds pretty good in a large room, but sounds absolutely amazing in a small room. Bass is decent all the time, but if you place in a corner bass is fantastic. Sound is well balanced and sounds good playing every style of music from Metallica to Katy Perry to DaBaby. We play for a few hours here and there and only charge every few days. Never had any issues with bluetooth connectivity to iphones. Well worth them money.
customer_reviews.author: J.L.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound!
customer_reviews.text: I've waited several months now to review this. Incredible bluetooth speaker. Battery life is amazing and the sound... just wow. Plug-in for really long run times, or just charge up for extended use wirelessly. Very very good audio quality. Fills up a room easy. So much bass too from a small unit.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph A. Eustaquio

customer_reviews.title: Good for 18 months
customer_reviews.text: I had this speaker for about 1 1/2 years before it started to make an obnoxious fuzz noise instead of producing bass and then turning off completely on songs w heavy bass. The problem seems to be worse if it’s not plugged in. It’s basically a paperweight at this point. I did not use it a great deal and felt like I was conscious of never making out on the volume. This was a disappointing purchase. I did love the bass output while it lasted.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea S Faulhaber

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these for my home and love them. They connect to Alexa pretty easy, and the sound quality, in my opinion, is top notch. My only issue is the "party link" that allows two speakers to run from one source, has a pretty short range, not really that big of a deal though. For the price, these are a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Heidi

customer_reviews.title: Amazing speaker! 5 stars.
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing bluetooth speaker. The sound is beyond what was expected, crisp highs and full booming lows, amazing sound! Bluetooth connectivity is effortless. Battery life seems good, but rarely do I use this speaker for more than a few hours. Overall I’m extremely pleased with this purchase and for the price, it can’t be beat.
customer_reviews.author: John P. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Garbage, do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: it works for about 10-15 minutes then it stops. I troubleshot the problem, and researched it online. people said anytime a cellphone is near it, the Bluetooth from the cellphone disconnects the speaker from the original source. if you live somewhere without cellphones, that is great, but for the rest of us...
customer_reviews.author: White Dog

customer_reviews.title: Poor Battery Life
customer_reviews.text: I'm rating this a 2 because I bought it because it said it had 8 hours of battery life. The sound is really good, but the battery life was more important.
customer_reviews.author: Sace

customer_reviews.title: Battery life is short
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is not what it’s supposed to be. The first time I used it unplugged I thought something was wrong because it kept shutting off. Turns out the battery only last about 45min to an hour. My friend has one of these speakers and recommended it and hers stays charged for much longer :/ and I feel like it sounds better. She specifically recommended the 4 gen so that’s why I went with it. For the money I wish I would have purchased something else.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Superior sound
customer_reviews.text: Superior sound through a very wide frequency range. Bass is not overwhelming but is clean and gets down to lower frequencies then other speakers. Sounds like there is a separate subwoofer some where. Battery life is mediocre. Sounds better if you leave it plugged in. No way of knowing if battery is 90% charged or 10% charged. The bad is it lasted less then two years. It now has a very bad crackling sound. No longer usable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Uphoff

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: The longer I have this speaker, the more I like it. Rich sound. Great speakerphone (I frequently sit at my desk and have it on in the back ground. When I get a phone call, the music goes off when I answer the call. Excellent speakerphone quality.) Elegant design. Very reliable. Long battery.
customer_reviews.author: JTB

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bluetooth-Enabled Speaker with Exceptional Sound
customer_reviews.text: I use this speaker for outdoors when I am working in my yard. It was recommended to me by a friend while tailgating at a football game. I will say that it is everything that he said it was in relation to be being a superior device. It connects to Bluetooth easily and remains connected even when I have incoming calls. lol The sound quality is exceptional.
customer_reviews.author: Keyven

customer_reviews.title: Great Speaker for the price
customer_reviews.text: Harman/Kardon is a well known speaker company worldwide. So I have decided to go for the speaker knowing it has a Bluetooth connectivity. I have purchased the speaker and a Bluetooth adapter for my computer. Well the sound quality surpassed all my expectations. It fills my 13' by 8' room (home office) with a great sound and I have no worries about wires running all over the floor. I can move it all over the room as long as I have an electrical outlet on the wall. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: abdimona

customer_reviews.title: Great Except
customer_reviews.text: Everything about this product is great except when I use the 3.5mm input, (from my pc for example) it takes about half a second for the sound to come through. There is no delay but it’s like the speaker needs to turn on again. This would be no issue if you just used it for music continuously playing, but for music creation, or similar and you need to pause for a bit then replay, you’ll need to wait that little delay and then replay it. ^ (This is not an issue with Bluetooth, ONLY thru the 3.5mm input) Other than this issue the sound quality is exceptional and I would really recommend.
customer_reviews.author: kavan

customer_reviews.title: ... purchase and this one lasts way longer with an amazing sound. It is a large speaker & a ...
customer_reviews.text: I had the studio 3 that had issues within a year of purchase and this one lasts way longer with an amazing sound. It is a large speaker & a pain to take to the beach but the sound quality rocks. I’ll probably buy another speaker so I can link them in the house. The insurance is also worth purchasing as they replaced the studio3 within a day and since it seems all of these portable speakers including other brands don’t last more than a year or 2... my ueboom died within 2 years
customer_reviews.author: sandra r

customer_reviews.title: I love this brand
customer_reviews.text: too much bass and have no control. I love this brand, had many of their products for long time. Catch up to the time, HK! have a phone app that can control base and sound quality... you have great hardware, we just need little more. I've download this free version of equalizer does it's job but am annoyed by ads.
customer_reviews.author: J. M. Lim

customer_reviews.title: Terrible sound at lower levels
customer_reviews.text: Base seems a bit overwhelming . Speaker sound muddled at lower volumes. Sounds great at louder levels. If you are looking for a speaker for back round noise, this is not for you. If you want something to annoy your neighbors while cooking out, this may be for you
customer_reviews.author: david k

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable Bass
customer_reviews.text: Great sound, the bass is amazing! Bluetooth connects seamlessly The only downside to this speaker are the legs/stand. This is the second one (first one is onxy studio 2) I have purchased. The first one got knocked over and the legs snapped off..there is no way to replace them so I have to lean it up against the wall...it still works but if the speaker piece in the back of it starts to touch the wall it distorts the sound. So be careful not to damage the legs.
customer_reviews.author: CindyS

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker I have ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Best Bluetooth speaker I’ve ever owned! Actually come to think of it, it’s the best speaker I’ve ever owned! Battery life is incredible and the sound is just as good as Bose at full volume and half the cost! Everything about this amazes my friends! Nobody can believe that such an amazing sound and bass come from this tiny circle! I’ve had this for over a year now and if It ever dies I’ll be buying another one! If you arean audiophile, do yourself a favor and get this Bluetooth speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Roger G.

customer_reviews.title: absolutely astounding!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best portable speaker I've ever had, and I've bought quite a few, including Bose Soundbar. This unit has adequate base, mid, and treble, for all sort of genre, and loud enough for a large radius. The clarity is phenomenal. You get way more for your money compare to other units in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Lori D.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: One of my family members has an older version one still sounds great but one of the legs came off and we lost it so I got him this to replace it. The first works fine but just doesn't sound right with it not sitting up but this one sounds just perfect. We love it. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Rae Rae

customer_reviews.title: Sounds is great, battery is meh.
customer_reviews.text: The battery died around the six month mark. Now I can charge it for days but will have no idea if it’ll last for two hours or two minutes. To be completely fair, I did leave it in my car overnight during a New England winter. I have no idea if this is what caused it, but i’m mentioning it in order to give a fair review. The sound quality is great. Everyone loves it. I loved my friends enough to buy it. Battery is a bummer. Either it can’t handle a night outside in a car, or it was faulty from the start. My friends is much older and still going strong.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: When I first received the Bluetooth speaker I was having difficulties with connection and contacted the vendor to return the item. Well I decided to keep it and give it a second try and what do you know, it turned out fine. I connect it to everything from my cell phone to my smart tv. The sound quality is movie like and the boost is awesome. I'm thinking about ordering two more for different parts of the house and using it for cookouts.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bass, fills the room!!!
customer_reviews.text: This by far the best Bluetooth speaker I have ever owned. I’ve been installing stereo equipment for 30+ years. I own a lot of loud Bluetooth speakers. That being said, I’ve never heard a better sound that will fill a room without beating you to death with piercings volume. This thing doesn’t need dB’s though it does have it. Quality over quantity.
customer_reviews.author: Rochell Czigler

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth speaker with high quality
customer_reviews.text: I own a Harman Kardon LG Bluetooth earbuds and the quality is great. So, I gave it a try and I bought this speaker. The quality is really amazing I like the high quality sound. However, I wish you could modify the settings because I would rather prefer a deeper bass. So far it is great for reunions with family and friends and the design is great that you can put it anywhere and it does not look awkward.
customer_reviews.author: Francisco Sánchez

customer_reviews.title: Better than the small speakers.
customer_reviews.text: I was able to experience the sounds from this speaker when a friend brought it to an event we held in a rented hall with a 200 capacity. With the high ceilings big venue, this speaker filled the space enough for everyone to enjoy the music and sound from a laptop and iPhone via Bluetooth. So, I bought one for my home and works as expected. It’s hidden behind my flat screen tv and fills my Family room with sounds that are crisp and whole. Bigger is still better than the small Bluetooth speakers. I haven’t fully tried the battery as I always have it plugged in.
customer_reviews.author: GLagasca

customer_reviews.title: Just stopped working
customer_reviews.text: I was thrilled with the speaker until one day (30 days after I received it) it simply stopped working. No sound. Not even the sound it made when the system turned on and off. I was so fortunate that it happened within the return window of time.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie C.

customer_reviews.title: Love this speaker
customer_reviews.text: The sound is great. We had the smaller Harman Kardon speaker but my husband accidentally ran over it with the motor home. So for Fathers day I replaced it with this one. We took it to the beach and three people took turns playing the music they wanted and it change from device to device flawlessly. You can't beat the sound. I just hope my husband doesn't run it over.
customer_reviews.author: clarece carter

customer_reviews.title: I'd rather pay less for the Onyx 3
customer_reviews.text: This particular speaker was a replacement for its predecessor, the Onyx 3. There is no noticeable improvement in sound quality and the speaker itself was made much more cheaply. The surrounding silicone (where you push the buttons) tucked into the shell falls out often. The bluetooth connection sounds great when the speaker knows which phone it was supposed to be connected to. I have to leave my phone screen on or else it sounds like losing phone call through a tunnel. The problem is also solved if everyone else in the house turns their bluetooth connector off completely.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: Be Careful: Sound so A....
customer_reviews.text: Making I opened the package and immediately put on music for my mom and then me and my three daughters had a dance party. In my pic I’m sweating because the audio is so good it made me dance my butt off. My friend Dave had it I loved the sound quality at his home and I got one myself. A1 sound!
customer_reviews.author: Broun Recloos

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, love it
customer_reviews.text: I'm simply in love with it, I had been looking for something like this forever, until I found this one, I use it to go to the beach and it's loud and the battery last long
customer_reviews.author: Yoshi

customer_reviews.title: It's okay
customer_reviews.text: Good sound quality, was expecting louder, battery doesn't last more than 3-4 hrs on a good day. It's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best speaker I bought
customer_reviews.text: I love the bass from the speaker. Good sound quality. And the speaker is portable for small group picnic or outdoor. The only downside is the battery life, which could play Songs with good quality for 4-5 hours. The Bluetooth connection is easy too.
customer_reviews.author: Nina4567

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Bluetooth Speaker!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product. It was everything as describe and look exactly like the photo. Delivered in a timely manner and new in the box. The speaker is very loud when it is plug up, but the volume will decrease some when it is not plug up. The speaker plays all of the music clear and Bluetooth connection is perfect. It comes with different adapters to plugin and use. It is also a large speaker. Will buy from seller again.
customer_reviews.author: shopholic

customer_reviews.title: My favorite Bluetooth speaker two times running
customer_reviews.text: I had the original 1st gen onyx studio for a couple years. Even though it still worked, I decided to buy this newer version for the aux port and battery. I can’t say it sounds much better than the first, but I can say that it sounds fantastic. Very well balanced sound and the bass is great. I wouldn’t pay anymore than $150 for it though. It won’t replace a bigger better system that you could get for more money.
customer_reviews.author: David Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Fills our need perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: A gift from my wife that allows me, a hard-of-hearing ex-musician, to have a personal B/T speaker driven by my itunes library, close to me wherever I go so I can listen at a satisfactory volume that doesn't overwhelm the rest of the house. Obviously, I can't speak to the sound quality, except it's as good as I can hear. But it is simple to set up, easy to use, plugs in the wall, makes me happy, and fills our need perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gillen Hauge

customer_reviews.title: Loving the upgrade
customer_reviews.text: So far I am loving the speaker. I had a a gen 1 for several years and one of my main issues was the battery life was around 2 hours and only one phone could connect(we all know how the chosen music master can get distracted and leave the music to stray) so I am loving how two devices can connect at once. I plan on testing the battery life soon after a good charge. I plan on trying connecting my TV to it as well and testing that as well.
customer_reviews.author: K Wilkerson

customer_reviews.title: Use everyday
customer_reviews.text: I bought to replace my HK onyx 3 which had the audio jack break and could only be used via bluetooth. I still have that one and use them both but the 4 is noticeably an improvement. Portable with good sound dispersal and ability to fill a room with surround sound. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Blockchain Revolution

customer_reviews.title: Who's BOSE?
customer_reviews.text: I didn't want to pay the price for a BOSE, so I searched for highly-rated bluetooth speakers and found this little gem!!! Ummmm...WOW. This fella fills my entire house with crystal clear sound which is a perfect match for my obsession with acoustic roots music. I can crank it and experience zero distortion. I would buy this again in a heartbeat and have already recommended it to friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: She's No Lady

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth had a tiny problem
customer_reviews.text: Good sound, good battery life. A couple times the bluetooth kept cutting out as if my phone were far from it, and I turned it off, then my phone, but I found I actually had to unpair and then re-pair. It has only happened twice and I have had it for months now. Other than that it's a pretty good speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: As usual Harman Kardon delivers a great product: I had other HK sound system and this one is so far my favorite (even over the Soundstick!) I live in a large loft and this little guy is able to fill the entire space with sound only by itself. it's very portable and easy to use. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Biaj

customer_reviews.title: Best speaker ever! The only one we use in the house!
customer_reviews.text: We had intended to buy 2 of these when we heard you could sync them up but after buying 1 it ended up working so well we just use the one we bought! Great sound quality and love that you can use your phone with it too and answer calls easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Sandoval

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of base. The sound put into it depends on how good it sounds. Excellent sound with a good sound source. Plenty loud. About 3 hours battery life on a high volume. Sounds better when plugged into charging. More powerful. 5 stars with better battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best HK Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: This is so awesome to listen to that I bought another one for a good friend. He loves it and cannot believe how great it sounds. Great Base and the battery life lasts about 6 hours of playing nonstop music. Your neighbors may not like it as much as the owner does. I have not done it yet but my friend told me that more than one of these can be connected to each other and I cannot imagine how great that would sound.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Ridge

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound for a BT speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound for a portable bluetooth speaker! Decent amount of bass for what it is. Best BT speaker I've owned so far. Will pick up a second one for stereo sound in my bedroom since you can connect to multiple speakers. A great deal at $135. I have no idea why Harmon Kardon is charging $450 for this speak on their website. While it sounds great, it doesn't sound $450 great. Was afraid this may be a counterfeit speaker but it seems legit.
customer_reviews.author: Richie

customer_reviews.title: Great sound - terrible battery
customer_reviews.text: This baby generates great sound and above average bass for a blue-tooth speaker. You can actually see the driver moving while the music is playing. That is probably why the battery life is so short for this speaker (less than 2 hours at full volume). It probably takes a lot of juice to move the driver the way it does. If you don't mind keeping this plugged in, however, you are going to get a lot of enjoyment out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Rothbard

customer_reviews.title: Poor controls and instructions
customer_reviews.text: Good sound but very poor instructions. You need an app to check battery and control playlist and by the way app didn’t work with my speaker so i can’t control the playlist or check battery life. Bought a much cheaper speaker before with more functionality.
customer_reviews.author: Pasadena

customer_reviews.title: Fraud
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product to stream several in my home. I purchased one and liked it. Good sound for a portable device-nice bass. Then I bought my next one, and after wasted days on my own and with their worthless support team, I have never once been able to play music on both speakers at the same time. Conjecture is they are aware of this problem, and skirting it.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine Haas

customer_reviews.title: Powerful Harman Kardon
customer_reviews.text: Best speaker out there! It's user friendly, the battery lasts up to 8 hours (fully charged) and it's easy to carry. The sound is outstanding. I use it to teach my Hot HIIT Pilates class and have also used it poolside (at home). The base sound is spectacular and overall it's an impressive sound for the size and price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I Have another Bluetooth portable speaker🤓 this is my 2nd pair,I Love the 5.0 Harmo/kardon surround sound I have the sound quality & for the price is amazing so I decided to go with the same brand on a portable electeonic😊didnt fail to let me down🤘 would reccomend classy system
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Hernandez

Rounding out the Onyx studio 4 offerings is a built-in microphone with voice logic, echo and noise cancellation for crystal-clear conferencing over the speaker.

Access Siri or Google now from the speaker with a simple button press. This can be easily configured via the HK connect app.
The superior fabric and finishing combines with iconic design to compliment any style.
